definition.content:
## Overview
- This dashboard gives insights about decryption logs.
- Decryption logs include a vast amount of information to help you troubleshoot, monitor decryption, and resolve issues.

## Widgets
1. Total Decryption Events
2. Decryption Events Overtime
3. Source Zone Distribution
4. Destination Zone Distribution
5. Top Sources
6. Top Destinations
7. Top Source Users
8. Top Destination Users
9. Top Inbound Interfaces
10. Top Outbound Interfaces
11. Top Source Ports
12. Top Destination Ports
13. Top Rules
14. Top Flags
15. Source Geolocations
16. Destination Geolocations
17. Top Applications
18. Application Technologies
19. Application Categories
20. Application Subcategories
21. SAAS Applications
22. Sanctioned Applications
23. Distribution by Application Risk
24. Top Application Characteristics
25. Action Distribution
26. Top Decryption Proxy Types
27. Top IP Protocols
28. Top Decryption Policies
29. Top Chain Statuses
30. Decryption Source Device Details
31. Decryption Destination Device Details
32. Application Configuration Details
33. Log Details
